description: The sun and a bicycle wheel meet in the Spoke Stencil Responsibili-Tee® graphic to celebrate Patagonia MTB: A community of mountain bikers who go long, get deep and protect the places we love to ride. To that end and to help save resources, this T-shirt is made with 100% recycled fabrics, is Patagonia’s lowest carbon footprint tee, and it’s Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.
name: Patagonia Spoke Stencil Responsibili-Tee - Mens
